name: Mengqi Gu
body:
### About Myself
I'm a M.S. student in [Department of Computer Science](http://cs.illinois.edu/) at [University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign](http://illinois.edu/). My advisor is Professor [Tao Xie](http://taoxie.cs.illinois.edu) and I work in the [Illinois Automated Software Engineering Group](https://sites.google.com/site/asergrp/) within the [Programming Languages, Formal Methods, and Software Engineering](http://plfmse.cs.illinois.edu/) area.

### Projects
